titleStmt.title: A short history of monastical orders in which the primitive institution of monks, their tempers, habits, rules, and the condition they are in at present, are treated of / by Gabriel d'Emillianne.
titleStmt.author: Gavin, Antonio, fl. 1726.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. Roycroft, for W. Bentley ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Gabriel d'Emiliane is pseudonym of Anthony Gavin.
